result.title: Editorial for beginners
result.content: Hello Friends, I have decided to write editorial for few problems regularly so that it could benefit at least few of the beginners to competitive programming. As a beginning i have written editorial for two questions: one problem is from Hackerrank's "zenhacks" contest â€” Find maximum index product and the other problem is from Timus online judge. I have posted them in my blog (link can be found below). I would like to know how far it is good and hence i request you people to have a look at it and give me some feedback ( both positives and negatives are welcome ). Link to the editorial: http://saraguru.weebly.com/how-i-solved Thank you guys!!
